title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building multi-tenant SaaS agents with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore (SAS407)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 构建多租户 SaaS 代理 (SAS407)
abstract: The introduction of Amazon Bedrock AgentCore equips builders with a range of new tools and technologies. These tools enable a range of new strategies and techniques that will directly impact how teams build multi-tenant AI solutions and agents. This session will dig into working examples how tenancy is leveraged and landed in an intelligence-as-a-service environment,  highlighting the multi-tenant nuances and possibilities that can built with the latest AI-powered AWS services. This includes a deep dive AgentCore multi-tenant pattern, spanning the identity, memory, gateway, observability, and run-time elements of the AgentCore experience. The goal here is to understand how SaaS providers can introduce tenant-context into their agents to support core SaaS mechanisms and constructs (onboarding, isolation, data partitioning, identity, etc.).
abstract_cn: Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 的推出为构建者提供了一系列新的工具和技术。这些工具支持一系列新的策略和技术，将直接影响团队构建多租户 AI 解决方案和代理的方式。本次会议将深入探讨租户如何在智能即服务环境中被利用和落地的实际示例，重点介绍使用最新 AI 驱动的 AWS 服务可以构建的多租户细节和可能性。其中包括对 AgentCore 多租户模式的深入剖析，涵盖 AgentCore 体验的身份、内存、网关、可观测性和运行时元素。这里的目标是了解 SaaS 提供商如何将租户上下文引入其代理，以支持核心 SaaS 机制和构造（入职、隔离、数据分区、身份等）。
